wikitext.*:
'''The Fellowship of the Ring''' was the first organized Tolkien club, it was founded by [[Ted Johnstone]] in [[4 September]] [[1960]] and held its first meeting at [[Wikipedia:18th World Science Fiction Convention|18th World Science Fiction Convention]] or ''Pittcon''. It dissolved in the mid-60s.
